text: The Statue of Krishna is an upcoming 50 feet bronze statue of a major Hindu deity Krishna in Saifai, Uttar Pradesh, India. The statue depicts Krishna during the Kurukshetra War in his "Rathangpani" form, that is, wielding a chariot wheel as a weapon. The statue was funded by the Saifai Mahotsav committee. It was designed by New Delhi based artist Edward Breathitt. ==References== ==External links== *Project gallery *KRISHNA, SAIFAI at Intel Art 3D Category:Krishna in art K Category:Buildings and structures in Etawah district Category:Bronze sculptures in India Category:Saifai Category:Tourist attractions in Etawah district K
title: Statue of Krishna, Saifai
